name: Projekt 41
description:
This is mine and LeytonMate's submission for Ludum Dare 41. This game is made with 2 specific genres. Fast paced 3rd person and some version of text adventure. The actual gameplay is made with a glitch of the character tipping over in Unity, which gives sliding mechanics. 

Controls

arrow keys/WASD - movement

mouse to look around

Esc. - Return to main menu.

To start, walk a bit forward and start!
